ComicInfo.Summary:
Pitt is in a coma after Zoyvod separated himself from his body. A mysterious alien shows up at the base Timmy also teleports into the base. He attacks her thinking she is here to kill Pitt, but Pitt awakens from his coma and tells Timmy she is a friend. She tells Pitt she can hide him in the Shimmerspace a realm outside the reach of Zoyvod Pitt agrees to go there reassuring Timmy he will return. Pitt steps through the portal as an angered Timmy teleports away.
